data.title: Descendants of Grand Duke Karl of Baden
data.text:
Last update on 4 August 2024

Karl, Grand Duke of Baden (1786-1818), m.1806 Princess Stйphanie de Beauharnais (1789-1860)

1.Princess Luise Amalie of Baden (1811-1854), m.1830 (div 1844) Crown Prince Gustaf of Sweden, who became Prince Gustaf Vasa (1799-1877)

1.1.Princess Karola Vasa (1833-1907), m.1853 Albrecht, King of Saxony (1828-1902)

2.son (1812-1812)

For issue of see: Descendants of King Maximilian I Josef of Bavaria
